analysis.description:
YupieToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x0f33bb20a282a7649c7b3aff644f084a9348e933.sol#219-299) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= absLowTimeBonusLimit (/unique_chucks/5/0x0f33bb20a282a7649c7b3aff644f084a9348e933.sol#259-270)
	- block.timestamp >= absMidTimeBonusLimit (/unique_chucks/5/0x0f33bb20a282a7649c7b3aff644f084a9348e933.sol#263-270)
	- block.timestamp > preSaleStartTime && block.timestamp < preSaleEndTime (/unique_chucks/5/0x0f33bb20a282a7649c7b3aff644f084a9348e933.sol#229-250)
	- block.timestamp > saleStartTime && block.timestamp < saleEndTime (/unique_chucks/5/0x0f33bb20a282a7649c7b3aff644f084a9348e933.sol#236-250)
	- block.timestamp >= absHighTimeBonusLimit (/unique_chucks/5/0x0f33bb20a282a7649c7b3aff644f084a9348e933.sol#267-270)
YupieToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x0f33bb20a282a7649c7b3aff644f084a9348e933.sol#160-163)
